name: Unnamed Grapple Game
description:
Use your grapple gun to get around. Fly through the air and dodge enemy projectiles while you collect flags to bring back to your base. Collect them all in the shortest amount of time.

This is an early prototype which is subject to heavy change. I plan to develop an upgrade menu that will allow the player to buy new things such as an air dash or a double jump. I also want to add more levels, and hopefully more things to do.

Music - DavidKBD HexaPuppies Pack
